comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This looks like a sports uniform to me. www.gettyimages.com/detail/85877754/Hulton-Archive is a picture of en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Daly_%28infielder%29 dmbworldseriesreplay.wordpress.com/2009/06/17/albert-spal... has a team picture that shows the Chicago Whitesox second baseman. I'm not prepared to say this picture is of that Tom Daly, but it's certainly possible.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
Swanq's hints are:
"Thomas Daniel Daly" (December 12, 1891 - November 7, 1946) 
"Thomas Peter Daly" (February 7, 1866 - October 29, 1938)
I think we are still looking for a "Thomas C. Daly"
